place_description: Coffeehouse chain serving signature drinks, mochas & lattes, plus coffee & breakfast.

reviews_data.review_text: This is one of my favorite Caribou locations!  Great staff and great space for "WFH"

This coffee is one of the best I have had.  Just right for me.
Of course I will be coming back!
The staff is very friendly. Chase made my Mint Condition Cooler exactly like I like it.
Better coffee, rewards program and staff than Starbucks. No up charge for oat milk when you use the app, very appreciative! Try the Berry white and Oat milk Latte definitely a fan favorite.
If you have not tried their Strawberry Fruit Shaker and the Peach Fruit Shaker, you're not doing your summer right!! Not to mention the staff is always so pleasant!

My favorite Baristas are there, they see me entering the store, and have my favorite drink prepared by the time I pay at the register. Yes, why don't I preorder/pay and avoid the wait.
Well, I only have to wait sometimes if there is a line at the register, and I like talking and greeting the cashier as well as my barista specialist.
And bottom line, the best coffee in town!

I enjoy their coffee their service is normally great but them being close to brueggers bagels I can't give it a decent rating for atmosphere.  It's disgusting in this location but you can see where it stems from. Just get coffee and head out.
Wish there was a Caribou in Lake Wylie!!
Friendly servers.  Always have a smile with every order .. it's the highlight of my day to go here

A cabin like environment with good coffee but questionable bathrooms.

This Caribou Coffee location is shared with Bruegger's Bagels. When I say it's split right down the middle, it's 50/50 shared, which provides an interesting layout.

For Caribou, they have plenty of signage displaying what their specials are & what they offer. They provide plenty of to-go snacks & Caribou products. Their design for their side of the building shows a cabin like feel. The cabin like design does provide a cozy feel.

The staff was helpful with providing options for drinks that fit our tastes.

The vanilla espresso shaker I got was enjoyable. The bean didn't taste burnt & the vanilla didn't overwhelm the espresso or oakmilk. This provided a nice balance between the flavors. The BOUsted drink my wife got was sweet but provided the caffeine jolt she was looking for.

The area where the drinks & staff were located was clean. The dining area was clean as well. The bathrooms were in rough shape. They could use a deep clean. A remodel may be a long-term solution, but I had to clean the toilet to the best of my ability prior to using.

Overall, this is a good spot to grab a quick drink in between shopping or running errands.
The mocha, blue berry muffin were good.  Service is always the best as everyone working knows my name and what I like.
I did not even stay to eat. there were too many dead roaches in the bathroom, and food crumbs everywhere on the floor. Hygiene was atrocious.
Work in the same shopping center and frequent often. Baristas are very nice, accommodating, and sincere

I wanted a coffee and wanted to bring my 4 month old puppy with me, so I checked the BringFido app. The app said that Caribou was dog friendly, and I've been wanting to try it anyways, so I thought "perfect!". I get there and order my coffee and everything without a hiccup. Then when I go up to the counter ask the barista if the cup sitting there was mine, she VERY rudely says, "by the way dogs are NOT welcome inside.... that's your coffee".

Not being dog friendly is 100% fine, I checked the BringFido app to avoid this situation, but obviously the app was wrong. However, that is no excuse to be so nasty to me and my dog. It was just extremely uncalled for. Not to mention there were literally other dogs inside, but somehow we were the only ones getting reprimanded? This experience really turned me off from Caribou and I don't think we'll be going back.

Photo attached is Peaches after we got the boot :)
Nice spot to grab coffee.  The coffee was good and there were a lot of people present.  This must be a very popular place.
Go wayyyyy out of my way to go here. My favorite!
Great service and great drinks, can get busy on the weekends, but they will take care of you.

Fantastic coffee here.  It's conveniently located adjacent to a bagel shop as well, making it a great breakfast stop.   They were very efficient and got the coffees made super quick.  Much better taste and quality than most chain coffee stores.  Try the campfire Mocha, it's amazing.

This is a great coffee shop. I've gone numerous amount of times and every single employee at this location has a great attitude while making delicious coffee. I suggest their pumpkin spice latte(when in season) or turtle mocha.
Great service from the friendly barista, and my drink was hot and delicious! Much better than Starbucks for sure.

The parking can be hard starting early afternoon and on weekends but I love the staff. Super personable, friendly and accommodating. I only wish they had breakfast sandwiches but since they are next to Bruegger's Bagel, they can't.
Best coffee in town!! Their drinks are always delicious and the staff is always welcoming!!! Open a standalone in Steele Creek pleeeease!!!
The staff at Caribou were very helpful. They checked ingredients for me without question. I was happy to be able to safely drink their raspberry hibiscus tea.
Great choices! Hot coffee is hot and fresh.
Beautiful ambiance and Spacious to dine in..
great spot to stop in and grab a bagel for lunch, and refuel with some caffeine for the rest of the day. Consistently good stuff, and never as pricy as the competitors across the street.
The Turtle Mocha will make you forget about your problems. The barristas were laser focused on perfecting my drink, in which they didn't miss.

I love the trivia; each day there is trivia and if you get it right, you get 10 cent off. The coffee is great too. Edit: we've been going in about once or twice a week for months now, and it's consistently great. I don't even have to order anymore; they know what I want when they see me walk up.
So happy my husband found this Caribou.
Very nice people and coffee  was great
Good place to go for a bagel and coffee. Very good Americano. They moved the sugar/cream station which is now on your way out the door.  This flows so much better, thank you.
Super fast service, average price for coffee.

Favorite place to have coffee in town. We drive 20 miles to have coffee here coz other coffee show definitely can't beat the taste and quality. I can have a Turtle or Campfire mocha anyday or anytime. Absolutely the best.
Best coffee ever but women's restroom is absolutely disgusting!

Caribou Coffee
[Park Road Shopping Center]
Great coffee!  Clever Thermoses for sale/ shares space with bagel shop
Large areas for gathering                          $
Nearby:  #1 Park Road Bookstore--Cute, real, phenomenal bookstore !
#2 BlackHawk Hardware--What an experience !
Love coming here but 2nd order this week with the wrong drinks

Excellent coffee! Yeah, when you go out and get coffee you will pay a little more than if you stay home and make it. What someone told me once, you get what you pay for. Give yourself a little splurge and get a real nice cup of coffee. They have hot and comd/iced offerings and although I had only one, I'm sure they all taste great. The associates were great and very helpful.

Will never come back! Wifi did not work, bathrooms were absolutely disgusting and I was given the tiniest water cup after asking for a larger one and being told there was a cup shortage? Really disappointed and won't be back...way better coffee and coffee shops in the area.
I wish Caribou had more locations in the Charlotte area. Their coffee is very smooth and has the right amount of roasted flavor.

First time going to this place.  It was clean and the staff were friendly.  I don't drink coffee or tea but the person taking my order recommended a Blast, I think that's what it was called, and it was good.  Their seating area was very nice as well!!
Sometimes hit or miss on the quality but overall positive experiences.

I went in today with two young children.  We ordered smoothies.  While we were waiting we used the restroom. There were three stalls.  Two were so disgusting we all used one which was gross but not as bad.  The sink had no soap and was gross.  The worst part was the poop on the floor by the sink.  I have never been so disgusted by the state of a bathroom.  Two women came in and walked out.  During these times especially cleanliness is key.  The whole place was disgusting I got our drinks and dumped them outside after telling the girls about the bathroom, who didn't care at all.  Never will I go back in this place.
always good coffee
Closes at 2:00. Does not fit my schedule anymore. Will go elsewhere.
Don't get the iced coffee. I just paid $4.50 for ice and brown water. Total rip off.
Great coffee and customer service!
Friendly staff & awesome coffee & bagels. Just what they advertised & they are damn good at it.
Very nice workers. Had a hot  turtle mocha. Yuuuum!

I go every  couple of months to same place only because  they closed university  store.  Just NO customer service  here. I buy four bags of coffee 40.00 a shot I even sometimes  go to Greensboro  to get coffee and shop service is a little better there. Working with public  need to smile let them know u r happy to see them.
Its the best coffee around! Just so pricey!

Not many of these left but this little stand is a great one.  Knowledgeable staff that knows how to make all the drinks.  Friendly and handcrafted feel, and lots of space to get some work done on your laptop.
Favorite spot to get coffee! Way better than Starbucks or any other competitor. Every location has a brueggels bagels in it you can't beat that.
Great spot
I think this is the last caribou coffee around in the city. I love all of their drinks and enjoy the vibe inside.
Great place to meet up
Nice location and great coffee!

"New york style bagels" just a little smaller.
Staff are very friendly and eager to help. A bit overpriced but very nice place to enjoy a cup of joe.
Best coffee house in Charlotte!
Love my campfire mocha and my MN Viking Girl cup  #tasteofMN

Caribou Coffee resides in the same shop as Bruegger Bagels for those who aren't aware. There's a divide between the two counters when ordering coffee versus breakfast items, although both sides do offer a small sampling of what the other is providing. The staff at Caribou Coffee were very nice and got my ordered filled quickly even on a hectic morning. The coffee itself (the flavored coffee option in caramel) was disappointing but I am used to very sugary lattes and this I'm sure was much healthier for me! The bathrooms, however, were pretty disgusting.
Very good
Nothing like a large Caramel High Rise to get the taste buds and the juices flowing!
Always love caribou coffee in all Charlotte locations
Can't find better than Caribou! The quality of what they serve puts other coffee shops to shame.
Sandwiches are terrible and price too high
Love that this is here. Makes me happy since I moved from Minnesota.

This is a wonderful place to eat a lot to choose from different bagels & meat cream cheese, oh my goodness please try the drinks call cool up or cool down it's delicious the drink has fresh fruit at the bottom of the drink amazingly good
The coffee was very good.  The coffee shop shares the space with Bruegers bagels. Service was fast.
Delicious coffee and friendly staff! Lots of space too!
Great coffee, cozy atmosphere, and cheaper than starbucks
Love Caribou coffee!
Great staff and quick!
Loop,
Wonderful coffee
Always The Best!

The service was prompt but my cappuccino was not flavored to my liking. This is not to say there is anything wrong with their coffee, it just was different than the flavors I'm used to. It was still nice to relax and enjoy a coffee slowly in their seating area. The store is in a nice strip mall with other interesting stores.
Have had good experiences here. Very inconvenient hours though.
Best coffee. I wish we had one in Concord NC
Always friendly and super helpful!
I LOVE that they have partnered with Girls on the run!!!!
Chocolate options include dark chocolate. I got a cute chocolate expresso bean on my drink. But it is 6 dollars for a coffee essentially.  I felt a little shortchanged on beverage.
Nice place.
Good as always

Great place for coffee and conversation or just spending some quiet time reading or writing.  Variety of coffee mixtures and small choice of pastries. Friendly staff, knowledgeable.  Helpful in making coffee or tea choices.  A favorite. Shares space with Brueggers Bagels, which offers visitors breakfast and lunch choices.
Very nice atmosphere to have an early morning cup of coffee.
great experience
Very good.
My favorite coffee place in Charlotte!
My favorite coffee shop.  I'm so hooked I buy caribou coffee for home and luckily you can buy whole bean.  Great atmosphere and great, friendly staff.
Totally great
I love Caribou coffee, its located in Park road shopping  center.its in with Bruggers bagel, love the light ,blonde roast.

Great coffee, excellent service - one of my most favorite ones. I've been a customer of this location for years and the staff has always been extraordinarily!
One suggestion: please keep the pastry selection up and items stocked throughout the day. Often there are only few left by 9 am.
Nice cafe, enjoyed a Chai Latte
My favorite place! I will be back once in town
A fine place to chill with a great coffee!
Nice place
Excellent

The Caribou Coffee shares the retail space with Brugger's Bagel which made me almost miss it.
Caribou is on the right side of the space and walked right up to order.
They were quick to take the order as well as get it prepared. I got a campfire cooler and it was delicious on the hot summer afternoon!
The service was with a smile.
Don't forget to try a shot at the daily trivia question for a small discount.
Great visit.

They close at 6:30 but it's 5:30 and they're putting the chairs up on tables. Mopping and vacuuming... not exactly a nice atmosphere with an hour til closing. :/
It's good they are finally cleaning up as pretty much every table was dirty with virtually no customers in sight...
edit. It's 5:35 and a woman just approached the front door and then turned around without entering. Perhaps it was the chairs on the tables. Maybe it was the guy vacuuming in the front window. Maybe it was the other guy sweeping in the other front window? Lol
What a way to welcome people!

Totally confused by any negative comments about this location! Caribou has the best coffee and staff is like family! I've never had a bad experience and I've been a Caribou customer for nearly 16 years (I need some stock or investment options). Truly a place that I enjoy going to because they make my coffee right (with all of my special requests) and it doesn't matter if I show up at 6:00 am or 6:00 pm. I kid you not, you'd think we are family when I bump into staff in the community. I'll be there daily with a smile, requesting my regular, and wishing them all well.
I was here a few days ago and witnessed an employee sitting on the counter (where all of the drinks are made) in spandex and texting. Ignoring all customers and all sanitary requirements.

Tried more than one coffee. None was tasty. No remedy or refund was offered. Use to be  customer but will not be going back again.
Too bad.
This place is a joke compared to starbucks..

I love caribou coffee, I drink it on a daily basis. My favorite flavors of there coffee are a blend of obsidian and eclipse, with a small bit of sugar in the raw in a french press - will be the best cup of coffee to wake up and start your day with.
Good place to get coffee and work for awhile. Busy and noisy at times.

Very nice staff, good selection of hard goods (mugs, coffee accessories etc) and ample places to sit. Caribou coffee is rainforest certified which places it in a wonderful category to fight the devastating impact some coffee growers have on deforestation. (Just my pitch as to why they are a great choice above others!)

This shop shares a space with the adjacent bagel place which provides some nice lunch and breakfast options. If it's crowded up front, make sure to check the back for more seating and a quieter environment.

There is free wifi if you want to stay for a while and even at peak times, the staff is very efficient to get ya moving!
I love this place and really good customer service!!
Best coffee ever!!
Fast and easy. Even if there is a line, they are skilled enough to be able to get you what you want in a timely manner.
Good place to sit and enjoy a good cup of coffee.
Busy but good
Almost unpretentious, good coffee, some "consciousness" posing, but a great place to catch up on work for 2 hours or so...
There is a lady named Christina who works here that is simply awesome! She made my drink so fast and it was totally the best drink ever!
LOVE the fruit smoothies!!
Great place, free wi-fi, really nice employees, always clean.
